bio: Originally from Virginia, and currently based in Boston, I'm a lifelong learner aiming to understand the world through technology, art, and music.
I am the founder of Greycliff Technologies, a software company that aims to democratize access to frontier innovations through our products Mentat and Sphynx.

projects.title: PlateMath
projects.description: A powerlifting assistant app that calculates RPE and visualizes barbell loading for workout planning.

projects.title: English-Greek Transformers
projects.description: Jupyter notebook implementation of transformer models for English to Greek translation with research paper.

projects.title: Java Yahtzee
projects.description: A command-line implementation of the classic Yahtzee dice game built with Java and OOP principles.

news.title: Welcome to my portfolio website!
news.content: I'm excited to share my journey in technology, music, and photography through this platform. Stay tuned for updates on my latest projects and adventures!

music.title: My DJ Journey
music.bio: Growing up listening to Flume, Disclosure, Skrillex, Deadmau5, and more, Electronic Music has served as the soundtrack to my life for over a decade. In 2023, I adopted the alias "Doctor B" and began to spin House, Techno, and UK Garage to share my love of electronic music with my community.
